title: BETWEEN
text:
The BETWEEN command is used to select values 
within a given range. The values can be numbers, text, or dates.
The BETWEEN command is inclusive: begin and end values are included.
The following SQL statement selects all products with a price BETWEEN 10 and 20:
To display the products outside the range of the previous example, use NOT BETWEEN:

The following SQL statement selects all products with a ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon 
Tigers' and 'Mozzarella di Giovanni':

Example

 SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella 
  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;

Try it Yourself »

examples.heading: Example
examples.code: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

examples.heading: Example
examples.code: SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE Price NOT BETWEEN 10 AND 20;

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
SELECT * FROM ProductsWHERE ProductName BETWEEN 'Carnarvon Tigers' AND 'Mozzarella 
  di Giovanni'ORDER BY ProductName;
